realtime_memories.content: AniMate Chrome Extension - Tech Stack: Vanilla JS + ES Modules (no build), dark theme UI, 2-space indent, semicolons, double quotes. Branding: lavender #B4A7D6 on dark navy #0D0D1A.
API keys configured: GitHub PAT, Anthropic API (Claude Haiku), OpenWeather API. Google OAuth working via chrome.identity with client ID 946033739086-tpvj6ts9o903qkf7c2ht7cpbjhjf9fgg.
UI Preferences: Popup must be compact/non-scrollable (320px width), Weather & GitHub widgets at TOP. Dashboard is full-page analytics view.

Completed Features: Browsing tracking, AI domain classification (Haiku batch/5min), clipboard vault, tab sessions, network logging, weather/GitHub/Calendar/Gmail widgets, weekly export, daily stats heartbeat, executive function support (morning briefing, start nudges, meeting awareness, distraction alerts, progress celebrations, quick launch buttons).

Design Decisions: 30-day retention, weekly JSON exports, 4hr focus goal, 1hr distraction threshold, 20 tab warning, exclude auth pages. Executive function: 9AM briefing, 10AM nudge, 6PM summary, 5min meeting warning.

User Context: Night owl tendencies (flexible schedule, no guilt). Primary challenge is task initiation. Prefers gentle nudges only (never blocking). Extension helps with external prompts to start work.
